stanza.line: Why is my verse so barren of new pridepride
So far from variation or quick changechange
Why with the time do I not glance asideaside
To new-found methods and to compounds strangestrange
Why write I still all one ever the samesame
And keep invention in a noted weedweed
That every word doth almost tell my namename
Showing their birth and where they did proceedproceed
O know sweet love I always write of youyou
And you and love are still my argumentargument
So all my best is dressing old words newnew
Spending again what is already spentspent
For as the sun is daily new and oldold
So is my love still telling what is toldtold
